statements: SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Checkup'
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT appointment_type, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY appointment_type
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Checkup' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND appointment_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT doctor_name) AS unique_doctors FROM appointments;
SELECT MIN(appointment_date) AS earliest_appointment, MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2021-12-15'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT appointment_id, status FROM appointments
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_reason FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.patient_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'F' LIMIT 10;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE availability = 'Available' ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM appointments_history WHERE history_id = 4;
SELECT patient_name, patient_contact FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_contact FROM patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_contact LIKE '%123%';
SELECT appointment_status, appointment_notes FROM appointments_history WHERE history_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
